song.title: Great Are You Lord
song.author: David Leonard, Jason Ingram, Leslie Jordan
song.presentation: V1 C V2 C B C
song.lyrics:
[V1] .G D Em You give life You are love .C G You bring light to the darkness .G D Em You give hope You restore .C G Every heart that is broken
[C] .Em D G Great are You Lord . C Em It's Your breath in our lungs . D G So we pour out our praise . C Em We pour out our praise . D G It's Your breath in our lungs . C Em D So we pour out our praise to You only
[V2] .G D Em You give life You are love .C G You bring light to the darkness .G D Em You give hope You restore .C G Every heart that is broken
[B] .Em D And all the earth will shout Your praise .G C Our hearts will cry these bones will sing .Em D C Great are You Lord
